column6: (StepDescription: Chop-Chop 2 tbsp cilantro) (StepDescription: Chop-Chop 2 tbsp cilantro)']
(StepDescription: Heat-Heat 1 tbsp oil in a small non-stick frying pan) (StepDescription: Heat-Heat 1 tbsp oil in a small non-stick frying pan)"]

column3: [' (StepDescription: cook-cook the tomatoes cut-side down until they start to soften and colour)']
[' (StepDescription: add-add the chopped cilantro to the bowl)']

column4: ErrorDescription:using hand finger? to beat the contents...)
column5: (StepDescription: Beat-Beat the contents of the bowl) (StepDescription: Beat-Beat the contents of the bowl)']
(StepDescription: Scoop-Scoop the tomatoes from the pan) (StepDescription: Scoop-Scoop the tomatoes from the pan)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: put-put tomatoes on a serving plate)']

column4: ErrorDescription:egg shells are in the bowl)
column5: (StepDescription: crack-crack one egg in a bowl) (StepDescription: crack-crack one egg in a bowl)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: add-1/2 tsp ground black pepper to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Pour-Pour the egg mixture into the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: stir-stir gently with a wooden spoon so the egg that sets on the base of the pan moves to enable the uncooked egg to flow into the space)']

column5: (StepDescription: Stop-Stop stirring when it's nearly cooked to allow it to set into an omelette) (StepDescription: Stop-Stop stirring when it's nearly cooked to allow it to set into an omelette)"]

column3: [' (StepDescription: Transfer-Transfer omelette to the plate and serve with the tomatoes)']
